TextList.OriginalText: All is as it should be.
TextList.TranslatedText: All is as it should be.

TextList.OriginalText: I must ask something of you, traveler.
TextList.TranslatedText: I must ask something of you, traveler.

TextList.OriginalText:
If you know it, speak it now. What is
the Big Bad Bazz Brigade password?
Fluffy white clouds!
TextList.TranslatedText:
If you know it, speak it now. What is
the Big Bad Bazz Brigade password?
Fluffy white clouds!

TextList.OriginalText: Yes! There is no mistaking it!
TextList.TranslatedText: Yes! There is no mistaking it!

TextList.OriginalText:
You are,
indeed, the real Master Link!
TextList.TranslatedText:
You are,
indeed, the real Master Link!

TextList.OriginalText:
The only people who know
that password
TextList.TranslatedText:
The only people who know
that password

TextList.OriginalText:
are members of the
Big Bad Bazz Brigade!
TextList.TranslatedText:
are members of the
Big Bad Bazz Brigade!

TextList.OriginalText:
The only people who know
that password are members of the
Big Bad Bazz Brigade!
TextList.TranslatedText:
The only people who know
that password are members of the
Big Bad Bazz Brigade!

TextList.OriginalText: That said, you haven't changed at all...
TextList.TranslatedText: That said, you haven't changed at all...

TextList.OriginalText:
But what have you been doing for the
last 100 years?
TextList.TranslatedText:
But what have you been doing for the
last 100 years?

TextList.OriginalText:
As though you could sleep for that long.
Hmph.
TextList.TranslatedText:
As though you could sleep for that long.
Hmph.

TextList.OriginalText:
Well, I suppose a lot has happened
in the last 100 years.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Well, I suppose a lot has happened
in the last 100 years.

TextList.OriginalText:
Anyway... I am glad to see you here,
Master Link.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Anyway... I am glad to see you here,
Master Link.

is upstairs.

เขาคือพ่อของ Lady Mipha!

TextList.OriginalText:
I am Bazz.


A hundred years ago, you frequently
trained me in the art of the blade.

ฉัน Bazz ไง
เมื่อร้อยปีก่อน นายมักจะสอนวิชาดาบให้ฉันบ่อยๆ

Well, he is as he ever was.
He is, even now, training to extremes by
poking

Well, he is as he ever was.

TextList.OriginalText:
to up his tolerance.
He does so for Lady Mipha's sake.
Electricity is banned for all Zora, and for
good reason.
TextList.TranslatedText:
to up his tolerance.
He does so for Lady Mipha's sake.
Electricity is banned for all Zora, and for
good reason.

TextList.OriginalText:
Although he is adamant,
I am sure even he has his limits.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Although he is adamant,
I am sure even he has his limits.

TextList.OriginalText:
Do not tell me you have
forgotten Lady Mipha...

Lady Mipha was admired by everyone
in the domain.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Do not tell me you have
forgotten Lady Mipha...

Lady Mipha was admired by everyone
in the domain.

TextList.OriginalText:
She was the beloved
princess of the Zora.
TextList.TranslatedText:
She was the beloved
princess of the Zora.

TextList.OriginalText: But then... Do you really not remember?
TextList.TranslatedText: But then... Do you really not remember?

TextList.OriginalText:
Actually, I think it would be best if you
heard this from
TextList.TranslatedText:
Actually, I think it would be best if you
heard this from

TextList.OriginalText:
However, if this person is the Hylian that Prince
Sidon brought, this all sounds too good to be true.

I don't think it's possible, but I'd better ask just to
be sure...
TextList.TranslatedText:
However, if this person is the Hylian that Prince
Sidon brought, this all sounds too good to be true.

I don't think it's possible, but I'd better ask just to
be sure...

TextList.OriginalText: No, but Hylians don't live more than 100 years...
TextList.TranslatedText: No, but Hylians don't live more than 100 years...

TextList.OriginalText: I'd better ask, just to be sure...
TextList.TranslatedText: I'd better ask, just to be sure...

TextList.OriginalText: Oh! And thanks to you, my father...
TextList.TranslatedText: Oh! And thanks to you, my father...

TextList.OriginalText: This really is the most relaxing place...
TextList.TranslatedText: This really is the most relaxing place...

TextList.OriginalText:
I must stay
on the lookout for suspicious activity!
TextList.TranslatedText:
I must stay
on the lookout for suspicious activity!

TextList.OriginalText: I wonder who in the world made it...
TextList.TranslatedText: I wonder who in the world made it...

TextList.OriginalText: I am watching the plaza from up here...
TextList.TranslatedText: I am watching the plaza from up here...

TextList.OriginalText:
I must make sure that no one suspicious
is allowed through.
TextList.TranslatedText:
I must make sure that no one suspicious
is allowed through.

TextList.OriginalText:
Do you see that huge structure there?
That is where King Dorephan is.
TextList.TranslatedText:
Do you see that huge structure there?
That is where King Dorephan is.

TextList.OriginalText: Everyone is defenseless as they rest...
TextList.TranslatedText: Everyone is defenseless as they rest...

TextList.OriginalText: So it is my duty to patrol the area!
TextList.TranslatedText: So it is my duty to patrol the area!

TextList.OriginalText:
I am leaving the main gate to Rivan and
his daughter...so I don't have to intrude.
TextList.TranslatedText:
I am leaving the main gate to Rivan and
his daughter...so I don't have to intrude.

TextList.OriginalText: Nothing to report over here, either.
TextList.TranslatedText: Nothing to report over here, either.

TextList.OriginalText:
Master Link, do you need me
for something?
TextList.TranslatedText:
Master Link, do you need me
for something?

TextList.OriginalText: Is there anything else you want to ask?
TextList.TranslatedText: Is there anything else you want to ask?

TextList.OriginalText:
What do you
need from me?
TextList.TranslatedText:
What do you
need from me?

TextList.OriginalText:
He is the father of Princess Mipha and
Prince Sidon.
TextList.TranslatedText:
He is the father of Princess Mipha and
Prince Sidon.

TextList.OriginalText:
100 years ago.

It has certainly been difficult ever since.

100 years ago.

It has certainly been difficult ever since.

with my sword training, and now I am
captain of the

with my sword training, and now I am
captain of the

The rain has

The rain has

I have been so angry about so much

I simply do not know
what is what anymore.
TextList.TranslatedText:

As captain of the guard, that should've

TextList.OriginalText: are the one thing I just can't handle.

Father is old enough to know better
